title: Fitbit deals drop latest Fitbit Versa 3 back down to lowest price yet
author: tabitha-baker
article: Fitbit deals are dropping some of the latest models to hit the market back down to their lowest ever prices right now, which means big savings across brand new releases.

The Fitbit Versa 3 looks like the best option right now, with $30 off, we're once again seeing a hugely popular $199.95 price tag available at Amazon right now. The newest in the Versa line, the Versa 3 hasn't seen too much action in the latest Fitbit deals, but this new price drop does mark the second time we've seen a significant discount on the impressive smartwatch.

You're getting all those fitness tracking features that have made Fitbit a household name, but the Versa 3 also introduces a massive six-day battery life, an always-on AMOLED display, and plenty of enhancements to heart rate monitoring and GPS as well.
